attributes.action: Stop the erection of a 413ft wind turbine sited close to highly populated area.
attributes.background: The turbine is large unshielded machinery and must be subject to risk assessment of hazards of flying debris in the event of structural failure of the turbine blades,  this happening may be statistically  small, should it occur it could be catastrophic with a risk of injury or death to the public.

rejection.details:
Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council. If you are concerned about a local planning decision, you could contact a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If you would like planning law across the country to be changed, you could start a new petition asking for the specific change you want to see.
